Topic.Title: Serious Question: will Dell fall to historical lows?

Message.Msg: You can play technical bounces with this thing. It is headed lower. They have nothing to offer in the mobile space. Too many years of doing exactly what INTC told them to do.

Topic.Title: Serious Question: will Dell fall to historical lows?

Message.Msg: dont listen to what any idiot on a message boards says..

the big, very big difference between CPQ and DELL is that the former found a sucker buyer that even changed its ticker symbol after the buy (HP -- HPQ). The latter (DELL) won't have any such luck. Dell must dig itself out of the very deep hole it finds itself in. Can they do it? Sure, yes, they can. It will take some very savvy and execution-focused management. They must hire some very smart engineers, keep them motivated by giving them great projects to work on etc. Their singular goal must be to out-execute Lenovo and HP - and to gain a bigger footprint with their software and storage products. If they all do this well, the stock will easily return to 15.
